abstract: The S.E.C. is interested in several issues, including the structure of the Facebook deal and media reports about the offering, according to people with direct knowledge of the inquiry.
snippet: The S.E.C. is interested in several issues, including the structure of the Facebook deal and media reports about the offering, according to people with direct knowledge of the inquiry.
lead_paragraph: The Securities and Exchange Commission has contacted Goldman Sachs about the private offering of Facebook shares to Goldman Sachs’s clients, according to a document sent to potential investors.

headline.main: S.E.C. Questions Goldman Sachs on Offering
